title: Gribmodify rules Section, defined in deode/data/gribmodify/gribmodify_rules.json
description: Rules for doing conversions to generate new messages in grib files.

input_grib_id.title: Input GRIB IDs
input_grib_id.description: GRIB key/value pairs for each input parameter. These need to uniquely identify the input parameter in the grib file.

operator.title: Operator
operator.description: Operator for computing the new field from input parameters

output_grib_id.title: Output GRIB ID
output_grib_id.description: GRIB key/value pairs for the output parameter.

additional_files.title: List of dictionaries defining the additional files
additional_files.description: For each additional file, a dictionary specifying, base: Toml-file header for the additional file, entry: toml-file key and static: boolean indicating whether the additional file is static or time-dependent.

layer_weights.title: Layer weights
layer_weights.description: Weight for each soil layer in weighted averaging starting from the surface. The numbers must sum to one.

physical_range.title: Physical range
physical_range.description: Allowed physical range of the input physical parameters.
